resources.string:
HELP
ReLaunchX is books manager and launcher for e-ink tablets. Developed and tested on Onyx Boox Max. It is a code-fork and continuation of ReLaunch 1.3.8.

Non-obvious:
- Bottom task toolbar is available only when run as a launcher.
- Some functions are disabled on non-rooted devices.
- Buttons and other things react on tap, long-tap, double-tap. Check the settings.

APPRECIATIONS
- ReLaunch project
  https://github.com/yiselieren/ReLaunch
- Android Asset Studio (icons)
  https://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/index.html
- CoolReader Engine project (Eink support code)
  http://sourceforge.net/projects/crengine/
- Interactivemania (icons pack)
  http://www.interactivemania.com/
  http://www.defaulticon.com/
